com.vector.cfg.automation.scripting.base

Class ScriptExecutionContexts

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vector.cfg.automation.scripting.base.ScriptExecutionContexts

  • @PublishedApi(value=ADDITIONS_ALLOWED)
 @PublishedApiDomain(value=AUTOMATION_IF)
 @ThreadSafe
public final class ScriptExecutionContexts
extends java.lang.Object
    ScriptExecutionContexts provides methods to retrieve the current active IScriptExecutionContext.

    The IScriptExecutionContext is saved for each thread.

    (c) Copyright Vctr Informatik GmbH. All Rights Reserved.

    See Also:
    IScriptExecutionContext

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentContextOfThisThread

        @PublishedMethod
 @Nonnull
public static java.util.Optional<IScriptExecutionContext> getCurrentContextOfThisThread()
        Returns the current active IScriptExecutionContext of this currently running thread. Or Optional.empty(), if there is no running IScriptTask.
        Returns:
        the current active IScriptExecutionContext of this thread.

      • getCurrentContextOfThisThreadChecked

        @PublishedMethod
 @Nonnull
public static IScriptExecutionContext getCurrentContextOfThisThreadChecked()
        Returns the current active IScriptExecutionContext of this currently running thread.
        Returns:
        the current context of this thread checked
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException -
        • if the is no running IScriptTask in this thread.
